info.author: Federico Tomassini
info.description: DbMother is the new version of Mother, a pseudo-orm to manage postgresql and sqlite databases. It allows to easily manage a connection pool and session (transactions) handling.
info.name: DbMother
info.summary: A python library to manage sqlite and postgresl connectivity
info.html_description: DbMother is the new version of Mother, a pseudo-orm to manage postgresql and sqlite databases. It allows to easily manage a connection pool and session (transactions) handling.
